#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int N = 301;
const int M = 100005;
const int MOD = 1000000007;

int T, n, m;
int f[N][M], fact[N];

int cal(int i, int v){
    if (v < 0)
        return 0;
    if (i == 0){
        if (v == 0) return 1;
        else return 0;
    }
    if (f[i][v] != -1) return f[i][v];
    int &ans = f[i][v];
    ans = cal(i - 1, v);
    ans += cal(i, v - i);
    ans %= MOD;
    return ans;
}

int main(){
//    freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    scanf("%d", &T);
    memset(f, -1, sizeof f);
    f[0][0] = 1;
    fact[0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 300; ++i)
        fact[i] = (1ll * fact[i-1] * i) % MOD;
    while (T--) {
        scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
        printf("%d\n", (1ll*cal(n, m - n * (n + 1) / 2)*fact[n]) % MOD);
    }
}
